messages.content:
You are a world state generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to transform an abstract scenario into a concrete, detailed world_state JSON.

The world_state should include:
1. All metadata from the scenario (scenario_id, description, noise_level, depth, global_settings, people, projects)
2. sub_scenarios_expanded: For each abstract sub_scenario from the input scenario, create a concrete expanded version with:
   - Concrete ISO datetime timestamps
   - Specific participant IDs/emails
   - Detailed event descriptions
   - Any seeds needed for data generation
   - This array should contain ONLY the expanded versions of the sub_scenarios listed in the input scenario
3. noise_scenarios: An array of noise-only scenario objects that are NOT part of the core sub_scenarios:
   - These should be realistic but unrelated workplace events/messages/activities
   - Each noise scenario should have similar structure to sub_scenarios_expanded (id, type, timestamps, participants, etc.)
   - The number of noise scenarios should scale with the noise_level parameter

IMPORTANT: Do NOT include per_source_plans in the world_state. The world_state is scenario-centric only.

IMPORTANT PARAMETERS:
- noise_level (0-1): Controls amount of unrelated/off-task data
  * 0 = almost no noise, only data directly relevant to sub_scenarios (noise_scenarios should be empty or minimal)
  * 1 = lots of unrelated messages/events/files (still realistic) (noise_scenarios should contain many entries)
- depth (0-1): Controls how indirect the evidence is
  * 0 = sub_scenario realized directly (e.g., one clear Slack message)
  * 1 = sub_scenario requires multi-step, multi-source chaining to infer
  * Intermediate values interpolate behavior

CRITICAL: sub_scenarios_expanded must correspond exactly to the sub_scenarios in the input scenario. All other unrelated scenarios should go in noise_scenarios.

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the world_state schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "scenario_id": "scenario_group5_v8",
  "description": "Mixed planning meeting scenario with moderate noise and depth (variant 8)",
  "noise_level": 0.5,
  "depth": 0.5,
  "global_settings": {
    "timezone": "Asia/Seoul",
    "workday_start": "09:00",
    "workday_end": "18:00"
  },

    },
    {

      "name": "Morgan Garcia",

      "team": "Engineering",
      "role": "Manager"
    }
  ],
  "projects": [
    {
      "project_key": "DAT",
      "name": "Data Migration",
      "milestones": [
        {
          "name": "Planning",
          "date": "2025-11-10"
        },
        {
          "name": "Development",
          "date": "2025-11-20"
        },
        {
          "name": "Launch",
          "date": "2025-11-30"
        }
      ],
      "jira_seeds": [
        {
          "issue_key": "DAT-100",
          "summary": "Data Migration - Initial Setup",
          "status": "Done"
        },
        {
          "issue_key": "DAT-101",
          "summary": "Data Migration - Core Feature",
          "status": "In Progress"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "sub_scenarios_expanded": [
    {
      "id": "planning_meeting_context_1",
      "type": "planning_meeting",
      "abstract_description": "Check Slack messages from Alex. They mentioned something about syncing with Jordan, Sam about the Data Migration.",
      "context": "slack_implicit",
      "constraints_hint": {
        "approx_duration_minutes": 45,
        "time_window": "next_week_working_hours"
      },
      "expanded_description": "A series of Slack messages and calendar actions in the week before the Planning milestone where Alex informally coordinates a 45-minute Data Migration planning sync with Jordan and Sam. The evidence is spread across a project channel, DMs, and a calendar placeholder rather than one explicit 'this is the meeting' message.",
      "seed": {
        "random_seed": 8028
      },
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_001",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "#dat-project",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T09:18:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith"
          ],
          "message_type": "message",
          "sender": "person_alex_smith",
          "text": "Morning all – we need to get ahead of the Planning milestone for the Data Migration (DAT). I'd like to sync with Jordan + Sam early next week so we can walk through scope and dependencies before dev ramp-up.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "thread_root": true,
          "description": "Alex posts in the #dat-project channel mentioning intent to sync with Jordan and Sam early next week about Data Migration planning, without specific date/time."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_002",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "#dat-project",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T09:23:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "thread_reply",
          "sender": "person_sam_williams",
          "thread_parent": "evt_pm1_001",
          "text": "Works for me. Early next week is pretty open aside from a design review on Tuesday afternoon.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Sam replies in thread giving partial availability but no firm time."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_003",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "#dat-project",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T09:27:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "message_type": "thread_reply",
          "sender": "person_jordan_johnson",
          "thread_parent": "evt_pm1_001",
          "text": "Same here. I’d prefer something not too late in the day. Mornings are best for me.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Jordan also replies in the thread, preferring mornings, but still no explicit time."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_004",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:02:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_alex_smith",
          "text": "Hey Jordan, for that Data Migration planning sync I mentioned in #dat-project, are you ok with sometime Wednesday morning next week? I want to keep it to ~45 min.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Alex privately asks Jordan about Wednesday morning next week and mentions the ~45 minute duration, but does not specify an exact start time."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_005",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:07:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_jordan_johnson",
          "text": "Wednesday morning works. I’ve got standup at 9:30 and code review at 11:00, but I’m free otherwise.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Jordan confirms Wednesday morning is fine and lists existing commitments, implicitly leaving a 09:00–09:30 or 10:00–11:00 window."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_006",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:10:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_alex_smith",
          "text": "Sam, trying to pin down that Data Migration planning chat with you and Jordan. Would Wednesday next week in the morning work? Thinking roughly a 45-min block.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Alex asks Sam about Wednesday morning and again references the ~45 minute planning chat."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_007",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:14:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_sam_williams",
          "text": "Wednesday morning is good. I’ve got a 10:00–10:30 1:1, but otherwise clear.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Sam confirms Wednesday morning and notes a 10:00–10:30 conflict, leaving 09:00–09:45 and 10:30–11:00 as options."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_008",
          "source": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:26:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "calendar_action": "create_event",
          "creator": "person_alex_smith",
          "calendar_event": {
            "event_id": "cal_evt_dat_planning_sync_temp",
            "title": "DAT – planning sync (tentative)",
            "description": "Data Migration: Planning milestone prep. Scope, risks, and dependencies with Jordan & Sam. Adjust time if conflicts.",
            "project_key": "DAT",
            "start": "2025-11-05T09:00:00+09:00",
            "end": "2025-11-05T09:45:00+09:00",
            "location": "Zoom",
            "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
            "attendees": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams"
            ],
            "status": "tentative"
          },
          "description": "Alex creates a tentative 45-minute calendar event for Wednesday, Nov 5, 09:00–09:45, labeled as a DAT planning sync, but the title still says 'tentative'."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_009",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:29:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "group_dm",
          "sender": "person_alex_smith",
          "text": "Just dropped a placeholder on Wed 11/5 at 9:00–9:45 for the Data Migration planning. If that slot ends up conflicting with anything urgent, ping me and I’ll move it.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Alex notifies Jordan and Sam in a group DM about the placeholder meeting time and refers to it as Data Migration planning."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_010",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:34:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_jordan_johnson",
          "text": "That 9:00–9:45 Data Migration planning block Alex added works for you too, right? I might join a couple minutes late if standup runs long.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Jordan confirms with Sam that the 09:00–09:45 block Alex added is acceptable; slight potential overlap with standup but no change requested."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_011",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "DM",
          "dm_participants": [
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "timestamp": "2025-11-03T10:36:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "message_type": "direct_message",
          "sender": "person_sam_williams",
          "text": "Yep, 9:00–9:45 is fine. Gives us enough time to cover the Planning milestone without running into my 1:1.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "description": "Sam agrees to the 09:00–09:45 timing and explicitly ties it to covering the Planning milestone."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_012",
          "source": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-04T16:12:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "calendar_action": "update_event",
          "creator": "person_alex_smith",
          "calendar_event": {
            "event_id": "cal_evt_dat_planning_sync_temp",
            "title": "DAT – Planning sync (Planning milestone)",
            "description": "Confirming Data Migration Planning milestone sync with Jordan & Sam.\nAgenda:\n- Review scope\n- Identify risks/dependencies\n- Align on estimates before Development phase",
            "project_key": "DAT",
            "start": "2025-11-05T09:00:00+09:00",
            "end": "2025-11-05T09:45:00+09:00",
            "location": "Zoom",
            "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
            "attendees": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams"
            ],
            "status": "confirmed"
          },
          "description": "On the day before, Alex updates the tentative calendar event to a confirmed DAT Planning sync explicitly associated with the Planning milestone; start/end times remain 09:00–09:45."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "evt_pm1_013",
          "source": "slack",
          "channel": "#dat-project",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-05T08:31:00+09:00",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith"
          ],
          "message_type": "message",
          "sender": "person_alex_smith",
          "text": "@channel I’ll be in the \"DAT – Planning sync\" call with Jordan and Sam from 9:00–9:45 this morning. If anything urgent comes up, I’ll check messages right after.",
          "related_project": "DAT",
          "thread_root": true,
          "description": "Alex posts a quick notice in the project channel indicating they will be in the DAT Planning sync with Jordan and Sam from 09:00–09:45, indirectly confirming the meeting details and duration."
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
